EmailTemplate.name: AIA_Benefit_Design_Approval_Requested
EmailTemplate.subject: For Review and Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please review and approve the following Benefit Design package.
Below is a link to the request. {!AIA_Benefit_Design__c.Link}
Please review the latest version of all the documents which are attached this is record.
You can Approve or Reject this by replying to this email with Approve or Reject in the Body, or through the AIA Application.
